name: BreakOut - A Ball And Paddle Game
name_original: BreakOut - A Ball And Paddle Game
description: This Game Is A Ball & Paddle Game Where You Hit The Blocks To Complete The Game. Now You Might Be Thinking "Well, That Isn't A Fun Game" You're Wrong. This Game Is More Than Just Hitting Blocks With The Ball. You Have 3 Health, You Can Get New Records, You Can Fail But Keep Playing Because This Game Is Fun!!! So Go And Play It!!!! Have Fun.
